ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Fighting on after linkdeath
ygData.msgSnippet: Na if it was a real bard dragon it would drop Flaming Clurgs as loot :)
ygData.messageBody:
Na if it was a real bard dragon it would drop Flaming Clurgs as loot :)

> -----Original Message-----

> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Fighting on after linkdeath
>
>
> Lies! Lies! It can't be!!
>
> C'mon...we're so...so...UBER...a bardish Dragon *must* be amazingly
> powerful, all knowing, wise, rich, and just so attractive!
>
> Like me...er, us! Right!?
>
> Atonal
>

>

>
